entry.title: $1850 // Absolutely Lovely SUNNY 2BR w/HWF*HUGE LIVING AREA*SEPARATE KITCHEN
entry.content:

2BR / 1Ba available now
listed by: landlord management
apartment
no laundry on site
street parking
We are offering this lovely 2 bedroom apartment featuring:

*2 Completely Separate Bedrooms.

*kitchen with stove and refrigerator.

*Bathroom with full tub and vanity

call now to view show contact info

3XS $1850 and $100 APPLICATION FEE (for each tenant and each guarantor)

2017 W2 FORM, SOCIAL SECURITY CARD, PHOTO ID, RECENT PAYSTUBS, LETTER OF EMPLOYMENT, BANK STATEMENTS, GOOD CREDIT!!! MUST MAKE 40XS THE RENT, WE DO ACCEPT GUARANTORS (must make 80xs the rent)
NO "OFF THE BOOKS" JOBS ACCEPTED
PLEASE CALL, TEXT OR EMAIL NOW TO VIEW:
show contact info. *********NO PETS!!!!*********
